metadata.name: Use Of The SFTP.EXE Binary As A LOLBIN
metadata.comment: Detects the usage of the "sftp.exe" binary as a LOLBIN by abusing the "-D" flag

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\sftp.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -d ..')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -d c:\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the usage of the "sftp.exe" binary as a LOLBIN by abusing the "-D" flag
